jd: From: Rajeev, Mobcoder rajeev.g@mobcoderstaffing.com Reply to: rajeev.g@mobcoderstaffing.com Hi, Hope you are doing well!! We do have Urgent opening for the below position. Please do find the job description below for your reference. Would appreciate if you can share your updated resume along with the expected rate. Job Title: Business Analyst with Payments Location : Jersey City, NJ (Day 1 Onsite) – (Prefer local candidates first) Durations: 12+ Months Responsibility:-Expertise in Banking and Payments domainProvide support as a project team member as needed.Act as liaison with internal and external partners.Contribute to preparation and review of test procedures and reports.Contribute to the development of a strategic customer roadmapEstablish and document processes to support all areas of responsibility.Create adhoc reports, data queries standard reports, and dashboards to support business needs.Maintain high quality project and software design documentation and analysis.Strong analytical, problemsolving, communication and presentation skillsWorking in conjunction with product, operations, and development teams to ensure that applications meetrequirements and are of high quality Review Business Requirements and document the functional requirements. Create Interface documents and data mapping and Interaction with our internal customers. Thanks & Regards Rajeev GuptaSenior IT Recruiter Mobcoder IT Solutions LLCCell: +1 469-676-1623rajeev.g@mobcoderstaffing.com Houston, TX 77064- USA
